title: Monday Post Show (12-13-21)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (12-13-21)
description:
The post show returns! Bobby starts by rolling through some voicemails we got over the weekend. Bobby addresses if he’s actually seen his grandmother naked because of the Raging Idiots “Grandma Song”. Bobby shares some stories about his time he spent outside of the country. He also talks about meeting a Dancing with the Stars fan at the airport who was working in customs. Also a story about something bizarre someone told his wife Caitlin on her flight back to the United States. Bobby takes a call from Listener Shaun who said he made the bottom of the list of Dancing with the Stars winners. Bobby shares some life updates he hasn’t been able to share yet. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
